flawed_nl_solution:
Fred has 63/3 = <<63/3=12>>12 dark blue marbles.
Fred has 63-12 = <<63-12=51>>51 red and green marbles.
Fred has 51-4 = <<51-4=47>>47 red marbles.
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
